action.action-desc: Mr. Price of North Carolina introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services

form.official-title: To strengthen the disclosure requirements for creditors under the Truth in Lending Act.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Online Credit Card Disclosure Act of 2015.
Section 127(b)(11)(D) of the Truth in Lending Act (15 U.S.C. 1637(b)(11)(D)) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in clause (i), by striking ; and and inserting a semicolon;
in clause (ii), by striking the period and inserting ; and; and
by inserting at the end the following new clause:

clause.text: if the consumer has an online account with the creditor under the consumer credit plan, be disclosed in a conspicuous and prominent location on a webpage of such creditor.
